description: Source file implementing back-end APIs for COSA Data Model related to bridging configuration, including creation, initialization, removal, registration, and retrieval of bridging information, as well as managing configuration data stored in external registry folders.

classes.name: COSA_DATAMODEL_BRIDGING
classes.description: Main data model object for bridging configuration in COSA, containing function pointers and internal data structures.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE CosaBridgingCreate(VOID)
methods.description: Creates and initializes the bridging data model object, setting up function pointers and internal state.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaBridgingInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the bridging configuration by loading existing data, creating default entries, and retrieving stored configuration from registry folders.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaBridgingRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up and releases all resources associated with the bridging object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaBridgingRegGetInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Retrieves and populates the current bridging configuration info from external registry storage.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaBridgingRegAddInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Adds a new bridging configuration entry into the external registry storage.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS CosaBridgingRegDelInfo(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
methods.description: Deletes a bridging configuration entry from the external registry storage.

ctags.name: CosaBridgingRegAddInfo
ctags.signature: (ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject,char * pNextInsNumName,ULONG ulNextInsNum,char * pPreffix,ULONG ulUpperInsNum,char * pAlias,ANSC_HANDLE hCosaContext)
